AT.name: Cave Story 3D
AT.description: Schon das Originalspiel wurde für seinen unkomplizierten, aber trotzdem spannenden Spielablauf und seine mitreißende Handlung gelobt - jetzt erscheint der Underground-Hit "Cave Story", der auch als WiiWare-Titel erhältlich ist, als "Cave Story 3D" für den Nintendo 3DS. Das seitlich scrollende Shooter-Plattform-Spiel vom Independent-Spiele-Entwickler Daisuke Ayama (auch bekannt als Pixel) wurde überarbeitet, um die Fähigkeiten der tragbaren Konsole voll auszunutzen und bietet jetzt noch mehr Spannung, Überraschungen und jede Menge Action, komplett in 3D. Das Szenario in "Cave Story 3D" ist einfach, aber faszinierend: Sie erwachen in einer düsteren Höhle, ohne Erinnerungen an Ihre Vergangenheit, und Ihnen bleibt keine andere Möglichkeit, als Ihre Umgebung zu erkunden und herauszufinden, wo und vor allem wer Sie sind. Aber Sie treffen schon bald auf ein Dorf voller hasenähnlicher Wesen namens Mimigas, die von einem mysteriösen Doktor verfolgt werden und - natürlich - jemanden brauchen, der ihnen hilft.

AU.name: Cave Story 3D
AU.description: The original game was lauded for its simple, yet engaging, gameplay and compelling storytelling - now Cave Story, an underground hit which can also be found on WiiWare, is making its way onto Nintendo 3DS as Cave Story 3D. Remastered to take advantage of the capabilities of the handheld console, this side-scrolling, shooting platform title from independent game designer Daisuke Ayama (a.k.a. Pixel) offers thrills, spills and tons of action, in full 3D. Cave Story 3D’s premise is simple but fascinating: you awaken in a gloomy cave with no memory of your past, your only option is to explore to find out where, and who, you are. Soon enough you happen upon a village of rabbit-like people called Mimigas, who are being persecuted by a mysterious Doctor, and naturally, need someone to help them.

BE.name: Cave Story 3D
BE.description: Le jeu original a été salué par la critique grâce à ses mécanismes de jeu simples et accrocheurs, et sa narration fascinante. À présent, Cave Story, succès méconnu également disponible sur WiiWare, fait son entrée sur la Nintendo 3DS sous le nom de Cave Story 3D. Remasterisé pour exploiter toutes les fonctions de la console portable, ce jeu de plates-formes et de tir à défilement horizontal créé par le concepteur de jeux indépendant Daisuke Ayama (alias Pixel) vous propose des frissons, des rebondissements et une tonne d'action, le tout en 3D. Le principe de départ de Cave Story 3D est simple mais accrocheur : vous vous réveillez dans une sombre caverne sans aucun souvenir de votre passé. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à explorer les environs pour découvrir qui vous êtes et où vous vous trouvez. Rapidement, vous découvrez un village peuplé de créatures proches du lapin qu'on appelle des Mimigas. Un mystérieux Docteur les persécute, et tout naturellement, il faut que quelqu'un vienne à leur secours.

ES.name: Cave Story 3D
ES.description: El juego original recibió estupendas críticas gracias a su simplicidad y a su emocionante argumento. Ahora, Cave Story, un éxito que también apareció en formato WiiWare, llega a Nintendo 3DS como Cave Story 3D. Renovado para aprovechar al máximo las capacidades de la consola portátil, este juego de desplazamiento lateral y disparos y plataformas del desarrollador independiente Daisuke Ayama (conocido como Pixel) ofrece emoción y acción en 3D. La idea detrás de Cave Story 3D es simple pero fascinante: te despiertas en una oscura caverna y no recuerdas tu pasado. Tu única opción consiste en explorar tu entorno para averiguar dónde estás y quién eres. Pronto descubrirás un pueblo con conejos antropomorfos de nombre Mimigas, que están siendo perseguidos por un misterioso doctor. Obviamente, necesitan tu ayuda.

Cave Story 3D’s premise is simple but fascinating: you awaken in a gloomy cave with no memory of your past, your only option is to explore to find out where, and who, you are. Soon enough you happen upon a village of rabbit-like people called Mimigas, who are being persecuted by a mysterious Doctor, and naturally, need someone to help them.

IT.name: Cave Story 3D
IT.description: Il gioco originale è stato lodato per il suo gameplay semplice seppur impegnativo e per l'avvincente narrazione. Ora Cave Story, un successo underground disponibile anche su WiiWare, approda sulla console Nintendo 3DS col titolo di Cave Story 3D. Rimasterizzato per trarre vantaggio dalle capacità di Nintendo 3DS, questo platform sparatutto a scorrimento laterale del game designer indipendente Daisuke Ayama (noto anche come Pixel) offre brividi, forti emozioni e tonnellate di azione, interamente in 3D. Cave Story 3D si apre con una premessa semplice quanto affascinante: ti svegli in un'oscura caverna senza alcun ricordo del tuo passato, per cui non ti resta che esplorare il luogo per scoprire dove e chi sei. Ben presto ti ritroverai nel villaggio dei Mimiga, esseri simili a conigli perseguitati da un misterioso scienziato, che ovviamente hanno bisogno di qualcuno che li aiuti.

LU.name: Cave Story 3D
LU.description: Le jeu original a été salué par la critique grâce à ses mécanismes de jeu simples et accrocheurs, et sa narration fascinante. À présent, Cave Story, succès méconnu également disponible sur WiiWare, fait son entrée sur la Nintendo 3DS sous le nom de Cave Story 3D. Cave Story 3D’s premise is simple but fascinating: you awaken in a gloomy cave with no memory of your past, your only option is to explore to find out where, and who, you are. Soon enough you happen upon a village of rabbit-like people called Mimigas, who are being persecuted by a mysterious Doctor, and naturally, need someone to help them.

NL.name: Cave Story 3D
NL.description: Het originele spel werd geprezen om zijn eenvoudige, maar boeiende gameplay en meeslepende verhaal - en nu komt de underground-hit Cave Story, die ook al voor WiiWare is verschenen, naar de Nintendo 3DS als Cave Story 3D. Deze zijwaarts scrollende mix van platformspringen en schieten, ontwikkeld door de onafhankelijke spelontwikkelaar Daisuke Ayama (beter bekend als Pixel), is nu geheel aangepast om de speciale functies van het Nintendo 3DS-systeem optimaal te benutten. Geniet van avontuur, spanning en actie in volledig 3D. Cave Story 3D begint even eenvoudig als fascinerend: je ontwaakt in een duistere grot zonder enige herinnering aan je verleden. Het enige wat je kunt doen is ontdekken waar je bent, en wie je bent. Al snel beland je in een dorp vol konijnachtige bewoners, de Mimiga's, die lastig worden gevallen door een mysterieuze dokter. Natuurlijk schiet jij ze te hulp!

NZ.name: Cave Story 3D
NZ.description: The original game was lauded for its simple, yet engaging, gameplay and compelling storytelling - now Cave Story, an underground hit which can also be found on WiiWare, is making its way onto Nintendo 3DS as Cave Story 3D. Remastered to take advantage of the capabilities of the handheld console, this side-scrolling, shooting platform title from independent game designer Daisuke Ayama (a.k.a. Pixel) offers thrills, spills and tons of action, in full 3D. PL.name: Cave Story 3D

Remastered to take advantage of the capabilities of the handheld console, this side-scrolling, shooting platform title from independent game designer Daisuke Ayama (a.k.a. Pixel) offers thrills, spills and tons of action, in full 3D. Cave Story 3D’s premise is simple but fascinating: you awaken in a gloomy cave with no memory of your past, your only option is to explore to find out where, and who, you are. Soon enough you happen upon a village of rabbit-like people called Mimigas, who are being persecuted by a mysterious Doctor, and naturally, need someone to help them.

PT.name: Cave Story 3D
PT.description: O jogo original foi elogiado pela sua jogabilidade simples e pelo seu enredo envolvente. Agora, Cave Story, um sucesso acessível também a partir do serviço WiiWare, chega à Nintendo 3DS com o nome de "Cave Story 3D". Reformulado para tirar partido das potencialidades da nova consola portátil da Nintendo, este shooter de scrolling lateral em plataforma da criadora independente Daisuke Ayama (a.k.a. Pixel) oferece muita emoção e ainda mais ação, tudo em 3D! A premissa de Cave Story 3D é simples mas fascinante: acordas numa caverna sinistra sem qualquer memória do teu passado sendo que a tua única opção é explorar para descobrires quem és e onde estás. Passado pouco tempo vês-te numa aldeia de pessoas-coelhos chamadas Mimigas, que são alvo de perseguição de um misterioso médico e que, naturalmente, precisam de socorro.

SE.name: Cave Story 3D
SE.description: The original game was lauded for its simple, yet engaging, gameplay and compelling storytelling - now Cave Story, an underground hit which can also be found on WiiWare, is making its way onto Nintendo 3DS as Cave Story 3D.
